fern.tools
Class Stochastics

java.lang.Object
  fern.tools.Stochastics

public class Stochastics
extends Object

Manages a random number generators for various distributions. By only using this class for every random number drawing in the whole framework, some advantages emerge:

  • it is guaranteed that the most quickest possible generator is used for each drawing
  • one can derandomize the algorithms by using setSeed(Date)
  • the number of random number generations can easily be counted

Author:
Florian Erhard
